course_title: Negotiation and Mediation in an International Setting
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 16 / Seats Avail: 9Waitlist Total: 0 of 6
course_description: After a 7-week overview of strategies and styles in two-party and three-party negotiations and mediations, this seminar will look at complex multiparty international negotiations, including but not limited to: selected issues in Middle East Peace, the civil war in Syria, conflict resolution in South Sudan, and the territorial dispute between Bolivia, Chile, and Peru.
sections: Class Nbr: 5768, Section #: 000, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 10:30a-12:30p, Instructor: P. Zwier, Status: Open
